verses.verse: And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1463>Behold<s%>, I am against thee, O Gog, <S%H7218>prince<s%> of <S%H7218>Rosh<s%>, <S%H4902>Meshech<s%>, and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>:

and I will turn thee <S%H7725>about<s%>, and will lead thee <S%H5927>on<s%>, and will cause thee to come up from the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>; and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

and I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thy <S%H7198>bow<s%> out of thy <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and will cause thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> out of thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H102>thou<s%>, and all thy hordes, and the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that are with <S%H5414>thee<s%>: I will give thee unto the <S%H5861>ravenous<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> of every <S%H3671>sort<s%>, and to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> to be <S%H402>devoured<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>; for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H4031>Magog<s%>, and on them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> in the <S%H339>isles<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> will I make <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; neither will I suffer my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> any <S%H1471>more<s%>: and the nations shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Behold <S%H935><s%>, it cometh, and it shall be <S%H1961>done<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>; this is the <S%H3117>day<s%> whereof I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and shall <S%H1197>make<s%> <S%H784>fires<s%> of the <S%H5402>weapons<s%> and <S%H5400>burn<s%> <S%H4043>them<s%>, both the shields and the <S%H6793>bucklers<s%>, the <S%H7198>bows<s%> and the <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and the <S%H3027>handstaves<s%>, and the <S%H7420>spears<s%>, and they shall <S%H1197>make<s%> <S%H784>fires<s%> of them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>;

so that they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> no <S%H6086>wood<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, neither cut <S%H2404>down<s%> any out of the <S%H3293>forests<s%>; for they shall <S%H1197>make<s%> <S%H784>fires<s%> of the <S%H5402>weapons<s%>; and they shall <S%H7997>plunder<s%> those that <S%H7997>plundered<s%> <S%H962>them<s%>, and rob those that <S%H962>robbed<s%> <S%H5002>them<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H1463>Gog<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H6913>burial<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of them that pass <S%H5674>through<s%> on the <S%H6926>east<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and it shall <S%H2629>stop<s%> them that pass <S%H5674>through<s%>: and there shall they <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>; and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> it The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamon-gog<s%>.
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6912>burying<s%> <S%H2891>them<s%>, that they may cleanse the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Yea <S%H5971><s%>, all the people of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H8034>them<s%>; and it shall be to them a renown in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall be <S%H3513>glorified<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And they shall set <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of continual <S%H8548>employment<s%>, that shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H5674>and<s%>, with them that pass through, those that <S%H6912>bury<s%> them that <S%H3498>remain<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H7097>it<s%>: after the end of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall they <S%H2713>search<s%>.

And they that pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%>; and when any <S%H7200>seeth<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H6106>bone<s%>, then shall he set <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H6725>sign<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H6912>it<s%>, till the buriers have <S%H6912>buried<s%> it in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamon-gog<s%>.
And <S%H1997>Hamonah<s%> shall also be the <S%H8034>name<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%>. Thus shall they <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H559>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H6833>birds<s%> of every <S%H3671>sort<s%>, and to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H6908>Assemble<s%> <S%H935>yourselves<s%>, and come; <S%H622>gather<s%> yourselves on every <S%H5439>side<s%> to my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> that I do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> for <S%H1419>you<s%>, even a great <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that ye may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, of <S%H352>rams<s%>, of <S%H3733>lambs<s%>, and of <S%H6260>goats<s%>, of <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, all of them <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> till ye be <S%H7654>full<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> till ye be <S%H7943>drunken<s%>, of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> which I have sacrificed for <S%H2076>you<s%>.

And ye shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, with mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, and with all <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> that I have <S%H6213>executed<s%>, and my <S%H3027>hand<s%> that I have laid upon <S%H7760>them<s%>.
So the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, from that <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>forward<s%>.

And the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; because they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against <S%H5641>me<s%>, and I hid my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H5414>them<s%>: so I gave them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> all of them by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
According to their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> and according to their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> I unto <S%H5641>them<s%>; and I hid my face from <S%H6440>them<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Now will I bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and I will be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%>, and all their <S%H4604>trespasses<s%> whereby they have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against <S%H3427>me<s%>, when they shall dwell <S%H983>securely<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%>, and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>;

when I have brought them <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>' <S%H776>lands<s%>, and am <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, in that I caused them to go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and have <S%H3664>gathered<s%> them unto their own <S%H127>land<s%>; and I will leave none of them any more <S%H3498>there<s%>;

neither will I <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> any more from <S%H8210>them<s%>; for I have poured out my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
